title: Alistar Support
body:
Hi All :)
As of late, my fellow summoners have been getting angry @ me  and tell me to pick another champ when i pick{{champion:12}}  sup...why is this? I think alistar is perfectly viable. I have been doing fairly well with him and even in games lost my KDA has been very fair.

Is it just because people dont see him as being viable anymore or they prefer someone else personally or am i missing something completely ?

He has great sustain good cc, very good peel for adc, and has a heal ( small but its still works ) and he dosent really seem to drop off at any point lv2 combo onward is amazing CC and you either gain more damage or become a cc tank.

But if i could get some opinions on the matter and maybe a discussion on supports in general :)

Cheers Shdw

replies.body: Tbh i trust in Braum... And Braum only {{champion:201}}
Personally i'd prefer to see a Thresh/Leona, but if the person is skilled with Ali i wouldn't mind as long as they can hit the W>Q combo.
Alistar is amazing.  Ignore the haters.
I agree, i do really think he has his place since he counters the likes of thresh and blitz with there cc actually helping ali out haha.
Alistar IMO is one of the supports that don't do well in solo-q. Nobody really likes him because most people who play him cant land a w+q combo.

As far as I know he's still top tier (I don't actually play him though). The people you're playing with have probably seen a few bad alistar players headbutting people to safety and such. I wouldn't worry about what they think.

Alistar is an amazing support. Your friend doesn't like your pick probably because he or she met a lot of noob Alistar player who fail the headbutt  pulverize combo and instead of ccing the enemy they knock them away causing them to successful get away from your team.

its not my friends who hate my picks its randoms trying to convince me that ali is bad haha. I was just so confused at this so i made this post haha :)
but he combo is deadly, and if u get a flash Q into a W back into turret its funny :P.

I will say this that sometimes the game hates me ill W someone into a wall and be like awesome cc & kill, then 5min later same place same wall and nope goes over haha...... only happend a few times but still i feel as if they are mocking me :P

Which means that the randoms probably played with a noob Alistar (a lot) and they probably lose their lane very hard because of the noob support.  Well past experience can really give you some nightmares so much so that you will convince ppl something is bad just so that you won't experience that same nightmare again.
you forgot to mention unbreakable will... easily one of the best tank abilities in the game.

oh yes its amazing. been testing out alot of builds as such for fun and it funny to see how little happens to you in team fights.
{{item:3110}} {{item:3069}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3065}}  i tend to find i build around these the most just for a best of both worlds option then fill with whats necessary.
I used to build talisman but opted for face for extra lane sustain. Then i build righteous glory for speed buff.

i dont mind face but i prefer the gold income and the cdr and re gen on talisman is awesome and 1 less cdr item to get, face late game kinda falls off i feel as the use on talisman is viable all game.

Yeah fair points. The sustain / heal utility falls off but the shield can still be very useful.  I guess it is a question of whether it is an aggressive engage ali vs defensive  carry protection ali. That said talisman can be used defensively too.

Not to presume, but what rank are you? I can't imagine anyone above Bronze complaining about Alistar support - especially if you've got enough experience on him.

If you don't play ranked, then I don't know why people are complaining - I'd much rather have Alistar than another damn Nidalee support.
also nid sup secretly means bot ap carry hehe <3
Then it's not a support role if your carrying...

this is just in normal games not ranked, id play what ever sup the adc wanted in ranked but i main top so thats always my first pick.
its just it seems there is this negative attitude towards him for some unknown reason, i myself never get spoken to badly just in the champ select lol they dont seem to like it.
